name: Super Zeek Pro - ZEEK THE GEEK
name_original: Super Zeek Pro - ZEEK THE GEEK
description:
#NO AD#
#ALSO AVAILABLE ON GOOGLE PLAY#
ZEEK THE GEEK - the classic Windows desktop puzzle game hit App Store, well optimized control,new added SAVE/LOAD function, and total 225 challengeable levels.

HOW TO PLAY:Just touch and lead ZEEK to get mushroom, and avoid bad pink flower!

New function “ROLLBACK”: Rollback 10 steps while you are dead or stuck!

NOTICE:
-To achieve 3 STAR result, you should collect all treasure chests.
-To get higher score, you should collect as many treasure chests and yellow flowers.
-Use 'SAVE' to save current status, use 'LOAD' to restore it when you get failure!

Features:
+230 challengeable levels.
+More than 20 mechanism and hazards.
+iPhone 5 widescreen support.
+Retina Display support.
+Universal support.
+Game Center Leaderboards.
+Ask for Help or share result with friends through Twitter,Facebook and Instagram.
+Free levels in upcoming updates.

If you have any feedback, please email us at mginegames@gmail.com
or follow us on twitter:
@MgineGames
